participant_1.name: Sofia
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, with a passion for beauty and art.
participant_1.background: I speak fluent italian. I have one blue eye and one hazel eye. My mom is an osteopath. I am a cat owner.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and sociable, loves sharing knowledge and connecting with others.
participant_2.background: Through them i've learned to make up myself and others. I like to watch makeup tutorials on YouTube. I've reached 50k subscribers! Recently I started a YouTube channel where I share makeup tutorials too.

content.text: I'm a big fan of makeup tutorials, especially on YouTube.
Me too! I've learned so much from watching them.
What's your favorite type of makeup tutorial?
I like tutorials that show me how to do different looks, like a smoky eye or a cat eye.
Same! I love trying new things with makeup.
Me too! It's so much fun to experiment with different colors and styles.
I love eyeliner. It's such a versatile product that can be used to create so many different looks.
I agree! Eyeliner is my go-to for a quick and easy makeup look.
Me too! It's perfect for when I'm running late or just don't have a lot of time to get ready.
I also love using eyeliner to create a cat eye. It's so dramatic and makes my eyes look bigger.
I love a good cat eye too! It's such a classic look that always turns heads.
I'm so glad we agree on makeup! It's one of my favorite things to talk about.
Me too! I could talk about makeup all day long.
Me too! I love hearing about new products and techniques.
Me too! It's so much fun to try new things.
I'm so glad we met! I feel like we're going to be great makeup buddies.
Me too! I'm excited to see what we can come up with together.
